List of the early church fathers:

  • St. Alexander of Alexandria
    1. -Epistle on the Arian Heresy and the Deposition of Arius
  • Alexander of Lycopolis
    1. -Of the Manicheans
  • St.Ambros [Doctorate]
    1. -Of the Manicheans
  • Aphrahat/Aphraates
    1. -Demonstrations
  • Archelaus
    1. -Acts of the Disputation with the Heresiarch Manes

Seven Ecumenical Councils:

  • Nicea I
    1. Doctines of the trinity
  • Constantinople I
    1. Council of Theodoseus
  • Ephesus
    1. The council that condemned Nestorius, departure of the Assyrian Church of the East
  • Calcedon
    1. Affirmation of Christ's 2 natures, departure of the coptics
  • Constantinople II
    1. Placeholder (havent read them)
  • Constantinople III
    1. Placeholder (havent read them)
  • Nicea II
    1. Veneration of Icons and condemned Iconoclasm as heresy

Local Councils:

  • Nicea I
    1. Doctines of the trinity
